name: Flame Tongue
description: 在一束范围内造成 [fire] 伤害。

name: Fireball
description: 对 [{radius}格:radius] 范围内的所有单位造成 [{damage}:damage] 点 [fire] 伤害。

Chaos Ball: 火球术随机造成 [physical]、[lightning] 或 [fire] 伤害。若单位对一种或多种伤害类型有抗性, 火球术造成其抗性最低类型的伤害。
Energy Ball: 火球术随机造成 [arcane]、[holy] 或 [fire] 伤害。若单位对一种或多种伤害类型有抗性, 火球术造成其抗性最低类型的伤害。
Ash Ball: 火球术随机造成 [poison]、[dark] 或 [fire] 伤害。若单位对一种或多种伤害类型有抗性, 火球术造成其抗性最低类型的伤害。\n火球术致盲一回合。

Meteor Size: 物理伤害和击晕范围从 0 提升至 1。

name: Lightning Bolt
description: 在一束范围内造成 [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] 伤害。

Channeling: 闪电箭可引导至多 10 个回合。
Judgement Bolt: 闪电箭还造成 [holy] 和 [dark] 伤害。
Energy Bolt: 闪电箭还造成 [fire] 和 [arcane] 伤害。

Cascade: 若主目标被消灭, 歼灭术会跳跃并击中其相邻目标。
Dark Annihilation: 歼灭术额外造成 [dark] 伤害。
Arcane Annihilation: 歼灭术额外造成 [arcane] 伤害。

Cascade: 若主目标被消灭, 歼灭术会跳跃并击中其相邻目标。
Dark Annihilation: 歼灭术额外造成 [dark] 伤害。
Arcane Annihilation: 歼灭术额外造成 [arcane] 伤害。

name: Teleport
description: 传送到目标地块。

Void Teleport: 传送术对目标地块视线内的所有敌方单位造成 [arcane] 伤害, 数量为充能上限。

Lightning Blink: 扑闪术在抵达时对 3格 范围内造成 [lightning] 伤害, 数量为移动距离的两倍, 上整。
Dark Blink: 扑闪术在抵达时对 3格 范围内造成 [dark] 伤害, 数量为移动距离的两倍, 上整。

name: Flame Gate
description:
每当你施放 [fire] 法术时, 在法术目标处召唤一个火元素。
火元素有 [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health]、[100_点_火焰:fire] 抗性、[50_点_物理:physical] 抗性和 [-50_点_寒冰:ice] 抗性。
火元素的攻击造成 [{minion_damage}_点_火焰:fire] 伤害, 射程为 [{minion_range}格:minion_range]。
火元素在 [{minion_duration}_回合:minion_duration] 后消失。
此效果持续到你不施放火焰法术为止。

name: Lightning Form
description:
每当你施放 [lightning] 法术时, 传送到该法术的目标地块。
获得 [100_点_闪电:lightning] 抗性。
获得 [100_点_物理:physical] 抗性。
此效果持续到你不施放 [lightning] 法术的首个回合为止。

name: Void Beam
description: 在一束范围内造成 [{damage}_点_奥术:arcane] 伤害, 并摧毁墙。

name: Thunder Strike
description: 对目标造成 [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] 伤害。\n击晕目标周围 [{radius}格:radius] 范围内的所有敌人。

Storm Power: 若目标在风暴云中, 范围和击晕持续翻倍。
Heaven Strike: 雷击术还造成 [holy] 伤害。

name: Stone Giant Form
description: 临时获得物理抗性和投掷巨石的能力。

name: Chaos Barrage
description: 在锥形范围内发射随机向单位发射有混沌能量的 [{num_targets}_支箭矢:num_targets]。\n每支箭矢随机造成 [{damage}_点_火焰:fire]、[{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] 或 [{damage}_点_物理:physical] 伤害。

name: Inferno
description: 生成一朵飘动的地狱火云, 每回合对其中的所有单位造成伤害。

name: Disperse
description: 将 [{radius}格:radius] 范围内的所有单位随机传送到新的地块。\n施法者不受影响。

Glassify: 改为将目标变为玻璃, 而非石头。被变成玻璃的目标 -100 物理抗性。
改为将敌人变为玻璃, 而非石头, 使其受到双倍的物理伤害, 而非四分之一。

name: Wolf
description: 召唤一头狼。\n狼具有 [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health]。\n狼的近战攻击造成 [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] 伤害。

Pounce: 召唤的狼获得一次跳跃攻击。
Blood Hound: 改为召唤鲜血猎犬, 而非狼。
Ice Hound: 改为召唤寒冰猎犬, 而非狼。
Clay Hound: 改为召唤粘土猎犬, 而非狼。
Wolf Pack: 每次施放召狼术消耗 2 点充能并召唤 4 头狼。

name: Dire Wolf
description: 召唤一头恐龙。

name: Giant Bear
description: 召唤一头巨熊。\n巨熊有 [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health]。\n巨熊的近战攻击造成 [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] 伤害。

Armored Bear: 召唤一头装甲巨熊, 而非巨熊。装甲巨熊有提升的物理抗性和 HP, 但易受闪电伤害。
Venom Bear: 召唤一头毒液巨熊, 而非巨熊。毒液巨熊的撕咬带毒, 每当敌人受到毒性伤害时会治疗。
Blood Bear: 召唤一头鲜血巨熊, 而非巨熊。鲜血巨熊有黑暗抗性, 每次攻击不断提升伤害。

Blindcasting: 鲜血视线施放无需视线。

name: Lightning Storm
description: Create a thunderstorm with a [{radius}格:radius] radius.\nEach turn, each tile in the storm has a [{strikechance}%_chance:strikechance] of taking [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage.\nThe storm lasts for [{duration}_回合:duration].

Blindcasting: 闪电风暴施放无需视线。

name: Prison of Thorns
description:
Surround a group of enemies with carnivorous plants.
The plants have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health] and cannot move.
The plants have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] damage.
The plants vanish after [{minion_duration}_turns:minion_duration].

Iron Prison: Summon iron thorns instead, which deal 3 more damage and are resistant to many forms of damage.
Icy Prison: Summon icy thorns instead, which have a ranged ice attack.

Channeling: Pillar of Flame becomes a channeled spell

name: Cloud Armor
description: Target unit standing in a lightning storm gains 100%% lighting resistance, 50%% physical resistance, and %d hp regeneration per turn for %d turns

name: Boiling Blood
description: All allied units gain stacking [{extra_damage}_damage:damage] bonus to their fire and physical abilities.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

Holy Fury: Boiling Blood also impacts holy abilities
Dark Fury: Boiling Blood also impacts dark abilities

name: Healing Light
description: Heal all allies in line of sight for [{heal}_health:heal].

Shielding Light: Allies in line of sight gain 1 shield

name: Regeneration Aura
description: Each turn for [{duration}_回合:duration], all allied units in a [{radius}格:radius] radius are healed for [{heal}_HP:heal].

Global: The aura heals all allies on the level

name: Void Orb
description:
Summon a void orb next to the caster.
The orb melts through walls along the way, and deals [{minion_damage}_点_奥术:arcane] damage each turn to all adjacent units.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by arcane damage.

Red Dwarf: Void orb deals an additional layer of fire damage
Void Walk: Targeting an existing void orb with another detonates it, and then teleports you to that location.

name: Searing Orb
description:
Summon a searing orb next to the caster.
The orb deals [{minion_damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage each turn to all units in line of sight.
The caster is immune to this damage.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by ice damage.

Matter Melting: Searing Orb can melt and be cast through walls

name: Ball Lightning
description:
Summon a lighting orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb fires [{num_targets}_beams:num_targets] of electricity at random enemy units in line of sight. The beams deal [{minion_damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by lightning damage.

Magnetic Pulse: Targeting an existing lightning orb causes it to emit a magnetic pulse that pulls [construct] and [lightning] units in line of sight 3 tiles towards the orb.

Shielding: The orb shields minions (1 shield, up to a max of 3) in the radius.

Freeze Chance: The orb has a 50% chance to freeze damaged targets for 1 turn

name: Orb Control
description: Retarget all allied [orbs:orb] to target tile.

name: Eye of Fire
description: Every [{shot_cooldown}_turns:shot_cooldown], deals [{damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Eye of Lightning
description: Every [{shot_cooldown}_turns:shot_cooldown], deals [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Eye of Ice
description: Every [{shot_cooldown}_turns:shot_cooldown], deals [{damage}_ice:ice] damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Eye of Rage
description: Every [{shot_cooldown}_turns:shot_cooldown], inflict [berserk] on a random enemy unit in line of sight for [{berserk_duration}_turns:berserk].\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

Lycanthropy: When Eye of Rage targets a [living] unit with 25 or less HP, that unit is instantly killed and raised as friendly Werewolf.  That Werewolf is berserked for 14 turns.

name: Nightmare Aura
description: Each turn, randomly deals [{aura_damage}_点_奥术:arcane] or [{aura_damage}_dark:dark] damage to each enemy in a [{radius}格:radius] radius.\nThis damage is fixed, and cannot be increased using shrines, skills, or buffs.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

Dark Dream: Upon ending, temporarily summon Ravens, Werewolves, and Old Witches based on the total damage dealt by the spell.
Electric Dream: Upon ending, temporarily summon Spark Spirits, Thunderbirds, and Aelves based on the total damage dealt by the spell.
Fever Dream: Upon ending, temporarily summon Fire Lizards, Fire Spirits, and Flame Rifts based on the total damage dealt by the spell.

name: Basilisk Armor
description: Whenever an enemy unit targets you with a spell or attack, that unit is [petrified] for [2:duration] turns.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Watcher Form
description:
Each turn, fire a lightning bolt at the farthest enemy in line of sight dealing [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage in a beam.
You cannot move or cast spells.
Gain 100 [physical] resist.
Gain 100 [fire] resist.
Gain 100 [lightning] resist.
Gain 100 [poison] resist.
Lasts [{duration}_回合:duration]

name: Imp Swarm
description:
Each turn, summon [{num_summons}_imps:num_summons] near the caster.
Imps have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health] and can fly.
Imps have a ranged attack dealing [{minion_damage}_damage:minion_damage] with a [{minion_range}_tile:minion_range] range.
Each imp is either a [fire], [iron:physical], or [spark:lightning] imp.
The imps each last [{minion_duration}_turns:minion_duration], and this effect lasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

Metal Swarm: Imp swarm summons copper imps instead of spark imps, and furnace imps instead of fire imps.
Dark Swarm: Imp swarm summons rot imps, void imps, and insanity imps instead of fire, spark, and iron imps.
Mega Swarm: Imp swarm summons giant imps instead of normal sized ones

name: Mystic Vision
description: All other spells gain [{bonus}_range:range].\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

Vision Aura: Mystic vision affects all allied units

name: Mystic Power
description: All other spells gain [{bonus}_damage:damage].\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

Damage Bonus: Mystic Power's damage bonus is increased by 4
Intensity: Mystic Power stacks in intensity instead of duration

name: Power of Pain
description: Your spells deal +%d damage.  Each turn you take %d dark damage.  Ends when you move.

name: Flame Burst
description: Deal [{damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage in a [{radius}格:radius] burst around the caster.

Melting Flame: Melt walls adjacent to the blast
Bright Flame: Flame Burst deals [holy] instead of [fire], and shields allied units instead of damaging them.
Spreading Flame: Each cast of flame burst consumes all remaining charges.\nFor each charge consumed, flame burst gets +1 radius and +1 damage.\nSlain enemies create additional explosions with half radius and damage.

name: Fire Drake
description:
Summon a Fire Drake at target square.
Fire Drakes have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_点_火焰:fire] resist.
Fire Drakes have a breath weapon which deals [{breath_damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage.
Fire Drakes have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] damage.

Dragon Mage: Summoned Fire Drakes can cast Fireball with a 3 turn cooldown.\nThis Fireball gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

Cloudform: Summoned Storm Drakes have 75% physical resist.
Drake Swap: Whenever you target a summoned Storm Drake with a lightning spell, swap places with it.
Dragon Mage: Summoned Storm Drakes can cast Lightning Bolt with a 3 turn cooldown.\nThis Lightning Bolt gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Void Drake
description:
Summon a Void Drake at target square.
Void Drakes have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_点_奥术:arcane] resist.
Void Drakes have a breath weapon which deals [{minion_damage}_点_奥术:arcane] damage and melts walls.
Void Drakes have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] damage.

Dragon Mage: Summoned Void Drakes can cast Magic Missile with a 3 turn cooldown.\nThis Magic Missile gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.
Essence Drake: Whenever a summoned Void Drake kills an enemy unit, a random temporary ally gains +4 turns to its duration.

name: Ice Drake
description:
Summon an Ice Drake at target square.
Ice Drakes have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_ice:ice] resist.
Ice Drakes have a breath weapon which deals [{minion_damage}_ice:ice] damage and [freezes] units.
Ice Drakes have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] damage.

Dragon Mage: Summoned Ice Drakes can cast Death Chill with an 8 turn cooldown.\nThis Death Chill gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Spark
description: Deal lightning damage to the target.  Chains to a limited number of nearby targets.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
Fire an arcing bolt of electricity dealing [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage.
The bolt repeatably arcs to new targets within the cascade range.
Each arc deals damage to all units along a beam.
The bolt can arc up to [{cascade_range}_tiles:radius], and cannot pass through walls.
The bolt terminates when it cannot arc to any new targets.

Cloud Conductance: Chain Lightning can arc to blizzards and storm clouds
Lightning Shield: Chain Lightning can arc to friendly targets.\nFriendly units hit by Chain Lightning gain 1 SH, up to a max of 3, instead of damaged.

name: Death Bolt
description:
Deals [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to one target.
Slain living units are raised as skeletons.
Raised skeletons have max HP equal to that of the slain unit, and deal [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] damage in melee.
Skeletons of flying units can fly.

Withering: Non living units damaged by Death Bolt lose max hp equal to the damage dealt.
Soul Battery: Deathbolt permenantly gains 1 damage whenever it slays a living target.

name: Wheel of Death
description: Deal [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to a random enemy unit.

Death Roulette: On kill, gain a Roulette stack for 10 turns.\nWheel of death hits an additional enemy for each Roulette stack you have at cast time.

name: Touch of Death
description: Deal [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to one unit in melee range.

Voidtouch: Touch of death also deals 150 [arcane] damage.
Flametouch: Touch of death also deals 150 [fire] damage.
Wrathtouch: Touch of death also deals 150 [physical] damage.
Touch of the Raven: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raised as a friendly Raven.
Touch of the Vampire: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raised as a friendly Vampire.
Touch of the Reaper: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raise as a friendly Reaper for 6 turns

name: Seal Fate
description: After [{delay}_回合:duration], deal [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to target unit.

Blindcasting: Seal Fate 施放无需视线。
Spreading Curse: When Sealed Fate's duration expires, it jumps to a random enemy in line of sight.

name: Volcanic Eruption
description: Create a [{radius}格:radius] burst of lava in a chasm.\nThe burst flows up to [{flow_range}_tiles:radius] out of the chasm.\nThe lava deals [{damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage

Wallcano: In addition to chasms, volcano may target walls.  Doing so turns the walls into chasms

name: Soul Swap
description: Swap places with a friendly [undead] unit.

Forced Transfer: Soul Swap can target enemy undead units as well.

name: Underworld Passage
description: Teleport to any tile adjacent to a chasm.\nCan only be cast while adjacent to a chasm.

name: Void Spawning
description: Summon a void spawner for 10 turns.  The void spawner is a stationary arcane creature that summons void bombers.

name: Earthen Sentinel
description: Summon an Earth Elemental.\nEarth elementals have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], [50_点_物理:physical] resist, [50_点_火焰:fire] resist, [50_点_闪电:lightning] resist, and cannot move.\nEarth elementals have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical].The elemental vanishes after [{minion_duration}_turns:minion_duration].

Earthquake Totem: Earthen Sentinel gains your Earthquake spell on a 3 turn cool down.
Stinging Totem: Earthen Sentinel gains your Poison Sting spell.
Holy Totem: Earthen Sentinel gains your Heavenly Blast spell on a 2 turn cool down.

name: Ghostball
description:
Deal [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to enemy units in a [{radius}格:radius] radius.
Summon ghosts at empty tiles in the radius.
Ghosts have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], fly, [100_点_物理:physical] resist, [50_dark:dark] resist, and passively blink.
Ghosts have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_dark:dark] damage.
The ghosts vanish after [{minion_duration}_turns:minion_duration].

Ghost King: A Ghost King is summoned at the center of the ghost ball.
Ghost Mass: A Ghostly Mass is summoned at the center of the ghost ball.

name: Mystic Memory
description: Regain all charges of a random other spell which currently has no remaining charges.

name: Conjure Memories
description: Regain a charge of each of your conjuration spells

name: Weave Sorcery
description: Your sorcery and enchantment spells get +3 damage for each enchantment spell you know and +1 duration for each sorcery spell you know.  Lasts 20 turns.

name: Permanence
description: Your spells and temporary summons last an extra [5_回合:duration].\nThis effect lasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Death Gaze
description: Each allied unit deals [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to a random enemy in its line of sight.

Vampiric Gaze: Each allied unit heals for 100% of the damage it causes

name: Bone Barrage
description: Your summoned allies in line of sight of the target take [physical] damage equal to half their health.\nEach affected ally deals that much [physical] damage to the target.

Bone Spears: Bone Barrage damages all targets in a beam from the minion to the target
Cursed Bones: Bone Barrage also deals dark damage
Shambler Assembly: Bone Barrage can target empty tiles.\nIf it does, it creates a bone shambler at that tile with hp equal to the damage it would have dealt.

name: Invoke Savagery
description: Each living ally attacks a random enemy unit in melee range.\nThe attack deals [{damage}_点_物理:physical] damage and inflicts [{duration}_回合:duration] of [stun].

name: Magic Missile
description: Deal [{damage}_点_奥术:arcane] damage to the target.

Shield Burn: Magic Missile removes up to 3 SH from the target before dealing damage.
Slaughter Bolt: If Magic Missile targets a [living] unit, it deals [poison], [dark], and [physical] damage instead of [arcane].
Holy Bolt: If Magic Missile targets an [undead] unit, it deals [holy] damage in addition to [arcane] damage.
Disruption Bolt: If Magic Missile targets an [arcane] unit, it deals [dark] and [holy] damage instead of [arcane].

name: Devour Mind
description: Deal [{damage}_点_奥术:arcane] to an enemy unit.\nThen, if the target is under 50% HP, deal it an additional [{damage}_dark:dark] damage.\nCan only target [living] units.

Gluttony: If Devour Mind kills the target, the charge cost is refunded

name: Death Shock
description: Deal [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage and [{damage}_dark:dark] damage to the target.\nIf the target is slain, this effect bounces to a random enemy in line of sight up to [{cascade_range}_tiles:range] away.\nCan hit up to [{num_targets}_targets:num_targets].

Infinite Cascades: There is no limit to the number of targets Death Shock can cascade to

name: Melt
description: Target unit takes [{damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage and loses [100_点_物理:physical] resist.

name: Dragon Roar
description: All allied dragons gain [{hp_bonus}_max_HP:minion_health], [{damage}:damage] attack damage, and [{cooldown_reduction}_回合:duration] cooldown reduction.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Ironize
description: All allied units gain [{resist}_点_物理:physical] resist, [{resist}_点_火焰:fire] resist, and [{resist}_点_闪电:lightning] resist and become metallic.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Word of Undeath
description: All undead units have their current and maximum HP doubled.\nAll other units except the caster lose half their current and maximum HP.

name: Word of Chaos
description:
[Stun] each enemy for [{duration}_回合:duration] and teleport them to random tiles.
Deal [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage to all [fire] enemies.
Deal [{damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage to all [lightning] enemies.
Each enemy construct loses all [physical] resist and takes [{damage}_点_物理:physical] damage.

name: Word of Beauty
description: Heal yourself and all living units fully.\nDeal [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage to [demon] and [undead] units.\n[Stun] all [arcane] units for [{duration}_回合:duration].

name: Word of Madness
description: [Berserk] all units except the caster for [{duration}_回合:duration].\nDeal [dark] damage to all [construct] units equal to half their current HP.\nFully heal all [demon] units.

name: Floating Eye
description:
Summon a floating eye.
Floating eyes have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], [{shields}_SH:shields], float in place, and passively blink.
Floating eyes have no attacks of their own, but will cast any other [eye] spells you know upon being summoned.
Floating eyes vanish after [{minion_duration}_turns:minion_duration].

Nature Mimicry: The Chimera will mimic nature sorcery spells as well
Dark Mimicry: The Chimera will mimic dark sorcery spells as well
Arcane Mimicry: The Chimera will mimic arcane sorcery spells as well

name: Arc Lightning
description: Lightning arcs to [{num_targets}_enemies:num_targets] visible from the target tile.\nEach arc deals [{damage}_点_闪电:lightning] damage to units in a beam.

Echo Flash: Secondary flashes dealing half damage and stunning for half duration are triggered at each initial arc target.

Acidity: Damaged targets lose all poison resist

name: Fan of Flames
description: Deal [{damage}_点_火焰:fire] damage to all units in a cone.\nThis spell can be channeled for up to [{max_channel}_回合:duration].  The effect is repeated each turn the spell is channeled.

Channeling: Fan of Flames can be channeled for up to 10 turns

name: Blue Lion
description:
Summon a blue lion.
Blue lions have [{minion_health}_点_HP:minion_health], fly, have [50_点_奥术:arcane] resist and [50_点_物理:physical] resist.
Blue lions have a spell that grants [1_SH:shield] to themselves and allies in their line of sight, up to a maximum of [{shield_max}_SH:shield] with a cooldown of [{shield_cooldown}_回合:duration].
Blue lions also have a melee attack which deals [{minion_damage}_点_物理:physical] damage.

Holy Bolt: The Blue Lion's melee attack is replaced by a range 6 holy bolt attack.

name: Death Cleave
description: Whenever a spell you cast kills its primary target, that spell is recast on a randomly selected nearby valid enemy target up to [{cascade_range}_tiles:cascade_range] away.\nThis process repeats until the target survives the spell, or there are no nearby valid targets.\nLasts [{duration}_回合:duration].
